title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Mosquitoes Test Positive for West Nile Virus  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Mosquitoes Test Positive for West Nile Virus  Mosquitoes near the Kettle Falls Day Use and Group Site Campground have tested positive for West Nile Virus. more     Information        Lakebed Fire Ban Established for 2016  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Lakebed Fire Ban Established for 2016  Effective immediately, all lakebed fires are prohibited on NPS lands. Fires are still allowed in park-provided fire grates and boxes as well as propane cookstoves and lanterns. more          Swimmer's Itch at Evans Campground  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Swimmer's Itch at Evans Campground  There has been a recent outbreak of "Swimmer's Itch" at Evans Campground. It is a skin rash caused by parasites that infect some birds and mammals. To reduce the risk of Swimmer's Itch, please towel dry or shower after leaving water.
